greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. cos(arctanh(x)), even powers only.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
program: (MAGMA) m:=35; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), m);  b:=Coefficients(R!(1+Cos(Argtanh(x)))); [1] cat [Factorial(n-1)*b[n]: n in [3..m by 2]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 16 2018
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Dec 28 2004
